item.description:
Are you ready to join the top 5% income makers?

 

Ray Giumentaro,"America's Accountability Coach," has amassed some of the greatest and creative thinkers in the areas of money, finance and investments. These folks are at the top of their game and have continued to flourish in today's economy. There is no one that is better positioned to assist you in the area of building wealth than these people.

UR Enough Wealth Summit

8:30 AM - 7:00 PM, September 23-25, 2011

Doubletree Suites, 400 Soldiers Field Road, Boston, MA 02134

Click here to register.

Speakers

Steven L. Keough has been a master coach and Chief Operating Officer for T Harv Eker and Peak Potentials. His experience as a thought leader in mentor spans over 20 years!

Robert Shemin became a millionaire at age 32, and has prospered in every economy because of his no nonsense approach to building wealth. He has appeared many times on CNN, CNBC, numerous local and national TV shows; and has been featured in some of the most prestigious publications such as BusinessWeek, USA Today, Wall Street Journal, and more.

Chris "Free Money" Johnson will teach you to get access to thousands of dollars from the local, state and Federal governments.

Dr. Albert Lowry will take your investment strategy to the next level and beyond.

Doug Ottersberg is a master hypnotist, success coach, NLP master and millionaire real estate investor.

 

3 Day Seminar

Friday, September 23-September 25

Doubletree Suites, 400 Soldiers Field Road, Boston, MA


Visit www.bostonareia.com/meetings.php to register today!

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: UR Enough Wealth Summit
